topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Salesforce is investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company Gainsight. The hacking group ShinyHunters has reportedly claimed responsibility.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/lorenzofb.bsky.social/post/3m63iasd24224- https://techcrunch.com

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: A Microsoft update has created an agentic OS infostealer attack vector.Sources:- https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1p26ww6/microsoft_update_creates_agentic_os_infostealer/

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Beckett Collectibles experienced a data breach and website content defacement in November 2025. The stolen data was subsequently advertised for sale on a hacking forum and portions were publicly released.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m62gpwwfou2f

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: The 'GANA Payment' project was exploited for approximately $3.1M+ on BSC. The attacker deposited 1140 BNB ($1.04M) to Tornado on BSC, bridged funds to Ethereum, and deposited another 346.8 ETH ($1.05M) to Tornado. An additional 346 ETH ($1.046M) currently remains dormant on Ethereum at address 0x7a503e3ab9433ebf13afb4f7f1793c25733b3cca.

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: NAFFCO INC was allegedly breached by a ransomware hacking group, which claims to have exfiltrated 1 TB of data including fiscal records, HR files, emails, budgets, strategic plans, and internal documents.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5zyswmljo2a
